name: 伊本·海什木
bio_short: 阿拉伯数学家、天文学家和物理学家，伊斯兰黄金时代的巨匠，被誉为“现代光学之父”。他通过巨著《光学书》（`ibn_al_haytham_optics_1021`）推翻了古代的视觉理论，并系统性地引入了实验科学方法。
bio_short_en: An Arab mathematician, astronomer, and physicist of the Islamic Golden Age, known as the 'Father of Modern Optics'. He revolutionized the understanding of vision in his 'Book of Optics' (`ibn_al_haytham_optics_1021`) and systematically introduced the experimental scientific method.
